Title: Relates to funding of state university of New York programs by state agencies
Summary: Provides that state-funded SUNY programs shall be reimbursed at no less than 26% of the direct costs; allows state agencies to fund SUNY programs where such state agencies determine that such program would produce administrative efficiencies or cost savings.
LawCode: Amd ยง179-ee, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to funding of state university of New York programs by state agencies
